DOC.detailed_description: Two group patient go abdominal surgery low-flow general anaesthesia . Group A ( sevoflurane group , experimental group ) Patients receive midazolam premedication 45 minute surgery . Dose 0,08 mg/kg i.m . Patients preoxygenated 100 % oxygen oxygen flow 7,5 L/min . When peripheral blood saturation reach 100 % , induction general anaesthesia start . For induction patient get anaesthetic thiopental 4,5 mg/kg i.v. , analgetic fentanyl 3 mcg/kg i.v . muscle relaxant vecuronium 0,1 mg/kg i.v . After 90 second patient intubate . After intubation anaesthetic gas switch . Oxygen nitrous oxide ( 50:50 % ) volatile anaesthetic sevoflurane 1 MAC ( 2,0 vol % ) . Patients ventilate anaesthetic device . Intermittent positive pressure ventilation ( IPPV ) tidal volume 8 mL/kg , respiratory rate 12 time per minute , flow 1 L/min . First 20 minute anaesthesia period saturation body anaesthetic sevoflurane . After 20 minute depth anaesthesia titrate level anaesthetic sevoflurane . Change +10 % sevoflurane MAC ( 0,2 vol % ) every change sign indicate shallow anaesthesia . Change -10 % sevoflurane MAC ( 0,2 vol % ) every change sign indicate deep anaesthesia . Signs show depth anaesthesia : arterial blood pressure ( systolic , diastolic mean ) , heart rate bispectral index ( BIS ) . Measuring point every 5 minute surgery . The goal provide value vital sign within normal physiology range . Analgetic fentanyl repeat every 45 minute dose 0,8 mcg/kg i.v . Muscle relaxant vecuronium repeat dose 0,5 mg/kg i.v . train four ( TOF ) show score 30 % high . It also measure ( every 5 minute ) : inspiratory expiratory concentration sevoflurane , saturation blood oxygen level end-tidal carbon dioxide . At end surgery , begin awaken general anaesthesia . All anaesthetic gas switch . Patients ventilate manually 100 % oxygen oxygen flow 7,5 L/min . Every patient get atropin 1 mg + neostigmine 2,5 mg i.v . decurarization . Measuring point : start awakening , extubation discharge operate theatre . It measure : arterial blood pressure ( systolic , diastolic mean ) , heart rate , inspiratory expiratory concentration sevoflurane , saturation blood oxygen , level end-tidal carbon dioxide , BIS TOF .
